extendedInfo.description: Santa is making a list...and checking it twice...Not sure if you have been naughty or nice this year?Check with the Naughty or Nice Detector!Can't remember whether a friend or family member has been naughty or nice?Check with the Naughty or Nice Detector! How to Check your naughty or nice status:*Open the Naughty or Nice app*Press your thumb against the screen.*Enjoy the sounds of holiday bells as your thumb is scanned*Reap your rewards once you've been checked on the listNice people get real surprise gifts like holiday music and free games :)Naughty people get a nice sack of coal.And don't think you can fool Santa...he's also in the app looking at you!The Naughty or Nice Detector is intended for entertainment purposes only.Check out our other apps!Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

reviews.title: Mest up
reviews.comment: Every time im nice its the same thing ZOO CLUB! SO STUPID!

reviews.title: Cool but......
reviews.comment: This game is cool but if it comes out nice,you get the same game!!!!

reviews.title: Rubbish people Don\'t download!
reviews.comment: Itt depens if u place your finger on the green bit of the finger print or the red bit! Red bit:tells your naughty.Green bit:tells your naughty.
